verses.verse: "The Levitical <S%H3881><s%> priests, <S%H3548><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> shall have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> portion <S%H2506><s%> or inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with Israel; <S%H3478><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> the Lord's offerings <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> and His portion. <S%H5159><s%>

"And they shall have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> their countrymen; <S%H251><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as He promised <S%H1696><s%> them.

"Now this <S%H2088><s%> shall be the priests' due <S%H4941><s%> from the people, <S%H5971><s%> from those who offer <S%H2076><s%> a sacrifice, <S%H2076><s%> either <S%H518><s%> an ox <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H518><s%> a sheep, <S%H7716><s%> of which they shall give <S%H5414><s%> to the priest <S%H3548><s%> the shoulder <S%H2220><s%> and the two <S%H3895><s%> cheeks <S%H3895><s%> and the stomach. <S%H6896><s%>

"You shall give <S%H5414><s%> him the first <S%H7225><s%> fruits <S%H7225><s%> of your grain, <S%H1715><s%> your new <S%H8492><s%> wine, <S%H8492><s%> and your oil, <S%H3323><s%> and the first <S%H7225><s%> shearing <S%H1488><s%> of your sheep. <S%H6629><s%>

"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> him and his sons <S%H1121><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> and serve <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> forever. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>

"Now if <S%H3588><s%> a Levite <S%H3881><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> from any <S%H259><s%> of your towns <S%H8179><s%> throughout <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he resides, <S%H1481><s%> and comes <S%H935><s%> whenever <S%H3605><s%> he desires <S%H185><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> chooses, <S%H977><s%>

then he shall serve <S%H8334><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> like all <S%H3605><s%> his fellow <S%H251><s%> Levites <S%H3881><s%> who stand <S%H5975><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
"They shall eat <S%H398><s%> equal <S%H2506><s%> portions, <S%H2506><s%> except <S%H905><s%> [what they receive] from the sale <S%H4465><s%> of their fathers' [estates.]

"When <S%H3588><s%> you enter <S%H935><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you, you shall not learn <S%H3925><s%> to imitate <S%H6213><s%> the detestable <S%H8441><s%> things <S%H8441><s%> of those <S%H1992><s%> nations. <S%H1471><s%>

"There shall not be found <S%H4672><s%> among you anyone who makes his son <S%H1121><s%> or his daughter <S%H1323><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire, <S%H784><s%> one who uses <S%H7080><s%> divination, <S%H7081><s%> one who practices <S%H6049><s%> witchcraft, <S%H6049><s%> or one who interprets <S%H5172><s%> omens, <S%H5172><s%> or a sorcerer, <S%H3784><s%>
or one who casts <S%H2266><s%> a spell, <S%H2267><s%> or a medium, <S%H7592><s%> <S%H178><s%> or a spiritist, <S%H3049><s%> or one who calls <S%H1875><s%> up the dead. <S%H4191><s%>

"For whoever <S%H3605><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> is detestable <S%H8441><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and because <S%H1558><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> detestable <S%H8441><s%> things <S%H8441><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will drive <S%H3423><s%> them out before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.
"You shall be blameless <S%H8549><s%> before <S%H5973><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

"For those <S%H428><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall dispossess, <S%H3423><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to those who practice <S%H6049><s%> witchcraft <S%H6049><s%> and to diviners, <S%H7080><s%> but as for you, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has not allowed <S%H5414><s%> you [to do] so. <S%H3651><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will raise <S%H6965><s%> up for you a prophet <S%H5030><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> me from among <S%H7130><s%> you, from your countrymen, <S%H251><s%> you shall listen <S%H8085><s%> to him.

"This is according to all <S%H3605><s%> that you asked <S%H7592><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly, <S%H6951><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Let me not hear <S%H8085><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> let me not see <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> anymore, <S%H5750><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> I die. <S%H4191><s%>'
"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'They have spoken <S%H1696><s%> well. <S%H3190><s%>

'I will raise <S%H6965><s%> up a prophet <S%H5030><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their countrymen <S%H251><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> you, and I will put <S%H5414><s%> My words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to them all <S%H3605><s%> that I command <S%H6680><s%> him.

'And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> about that whoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to My words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in My name, <S%H8034><s%> I Myself <S%H595><s%> will require <S%H1875><s%> [it] of him.

'But the prophet <S%H5030><s%> who <S%H834><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> presumptuously <S%H2102><s%> in My name <S%H8034><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have not commanded <S%H6680><s%> him to speak, <S%H1696><s%> or which <S%H834><s%> he shall speak <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> that prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall die. <S%H4191><s%>'

"And you may say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> 'How <S%H351><s%> shall we know <S%H3045><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken <S%H1696><s%>?'

"When <S%H834><s%> a prophet <S%H5030><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> if the thing <S%H1697><s%> does not come <S%H1961><s%> about or come <S%H935><s%> true, that is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken. <S%H1696><s%> The prophet <S%H5030><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> it presumptuously; <S%H2087><s%> you shall not be afraid <S%H9076><s%> of him.
